metadata.title: CVE-2023-28339 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: OpenDoas through 6.8.2, when TIOCSTI is available, allows privilegeescalation because of sharing a terminal with the original session. NOTE:TIOCSTI is unavailable in OpenBSD 6.0 and later, and can be madeunavailable in the Linux kernel 6.2 and later.

criterions.comment: doas package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
